artPieces.title: Traditional Madhubani Fish Art
artPieces.description: Traditional Madhubani painting featuring fish motifs, representing fertility and prosperity in Indian folk art tradition.

artPieces.description: Vibrant Madhubani painting showcasing intricate patterns and mythological themes typical of Bihar's folk art tradition.

artPieces.title: Sacred Bronze Deity
artPieces.description: Exquisite South Indian bronze sculpture depicting a sacred deity, crafted using the traditional lost-wax casting technique.

artPieces.title: Classical Bronze Figure
artPieces.description: Classical South Indian bronze sculpture representing divine grace and artistic excellence of Chola period craftsmanship.

artPieces.title: Warli Dance Celebration
artPieces.description: Traditional Warli art depicting community dance and celebration, painted in the characteristic white on earth tone style.
artPieces.medium: Natural white pigment on brown paper

artPieces.title: Tanjore Divine Portrait
artPieces.description: Magnificent Tanjore painting with gold leaf work and precious stone embellishments, representing divine beauty and prosperity.
artPieces.medium: Gold leaf and gems on wood

artPieces.title: Miniature Court Scene
artPieces.description: Intricate Indian miniature painting depicting royal court scenes with fine brushwork and detailed storytelling.

artPieces.title: Detailed Miniature Art
artPieces.description: Exquisitely detailed miniature painting showcasing the precision and artistry of traditional Indian miniature art form.
